lead_paragraph: The Cubs, who had been searching for a center fielder, agreed Thursday to a three-year, $15 million contract with Marlon Byrd.
snippet: The Cubs, who had been searching for a center fielder, agreed Thursday to a three-year, $15 million contract with Marlon Byrd.

headline.main: With Bradley Out, Cubs Bring in Byrd
headline.print_headline: With Bradley Out,cubs Bring In Byrd
